snippet: BNP Paribas, the largest French bank, said net income more than doubled, to $1.7 billion, in the third quarter, lifted by a strong performance in its investment banking unit.
abstract: BNP Paribas, the largest French bank, said net income more than doubled, to $1.7 billion, in the third quarter, lifted by a strong performance in its investment banking unit.

headline.main: BNP Third-Quarter Profit Doubles to Hit $1.7 Billion
headline.print_headline: Profit at Big French Bank Doubles to Hit $1.7 Billion
